name: Homelette (Untailo)
description:
The absolute best game in the world where a wood dummy and a spider have to work together to save the world from an evil king.

They each have different abilities and you control each of them independentely to solve puzzles, defeat ennemies and progress.

But it's just a demo for now so there isn't much puzzle or ennemies.

If you have trouble playing from the browser, you can download the exe version for Windows.

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Ctrl to interact

Z to switch character

Tileset is from https://www.kenney.nl/ , music is "Fretless" by Kevin MacLeod.
